name: Centipedes In Space - GDKO 2023 - Round 4
description:
In a small blue galaxy out among the stars there is usually peace and friendship. that is until strange alien creatures came to attack the citizens. these "centipedes" must be destroyed along with their evil companions before they can attack the rest of the inhabitants. its up to you to save them all

Controls:
Mouse - Aim
Left Click - Shoot

Credits:
Music - https://patrickdearteaga.com/royalty-free-music/full-list
All other assets were made by me
